rows.label: qev050104_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ha ha! You have more than proven your strength.
You have an impressive blend of fearsome power and
beautiful technique.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0002
rows.name: I see now why master Go Belg sent you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0003
rows.name:
I lack your refined skill. I merely fix the enemy in my
sights and charge forth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Until now, Gi Ziorde was always at my back to help
direct that force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0005
rows.name:
Fighting you has forced me to acknowledge just what a
boon that was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050104_SEL0011
rows.name:
Suggest that Gi Ziordo rejoin
Gi Ziorde and train at his side.

rows.label: qev050104_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050104_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Gi Ziordo that he must address
those shortcomings by himself.

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0006
rows.name:
Hmmm. Perhaps you are right. I could spend a lifetime
pressing on alone and never reach your level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0007
rows.name:
You are...very strong. But in my case, I doubt I could
find those qualities without his aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0008
rows.name:
Heh. Ours was no minor quarrel, either. And while I
am unsure how to approach him now, I will begin by
asking my master where to find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0009
rows.name:
You must go and fight Gi Ziorde as well.
For he is my nemesis...and greatest ally![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0010
rows.name:
I eagerly await the day we cross blades again.
For now, farewell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0011
rows.name:

rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0018
rows.name:
Heh. Ours was no minor quarrel, either. And while I
am unsure how to approach him now, I will begin by
asking my master where to find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0019
rows.name:
Farewell for now, brave warrior.
I thank you for showing me my folly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050104_MSG0020
rows.name:
I wonder what Gi Ziorde thought after fighting you.
For he remains my nemesis and greatest ally![ST:wait ]
